: ==TEAM LUCIFER==

Story: Mak and Nak are a young couple who are soon to be married. After house hunting they decide to buy a run down old property in Bangkok. As they make preparations to move into their new house they do not realise that a ghost has begun to protect them from the bad intentions of people around them. When they move into the house, the actions of the ghost become directed towards them themselves...
